page.title: 04Electronics at Hillend
page.content: The electronics industry is the dominant industry in the Hillend Industrial Estate. There are many international firms there such as {Marconi Instruments.}There are also many local firms such as{Highland {Electronics, Northern Circuits}and the highly successful{Fortronic.}This company has the contract with some of the major banks to fit autotellers and they pioneered electronic banking along with the English firm{Burroughs with whom they have close contacts. Recently{Fortronic}have amalgamated with the{Wang corporation}of Japan. {Marconi Instruments}and{Marconi Secure {Radio}are the main companies in the estate.{Marconi Instruments}makes missile guidance systems and other military hardware.{Marconi secure {radio}makes military communications devices like the{Clansman radio.
